name: Snowless Road
description:
The poor Snowman will defenetly melt on this hot summer day. Get him as far away as possible. Use ice cream stands, umbrellas, and snowballs to cool him down. But be aware of bikers and running water! The Snowman won't live long!

This game was created for GMTK Game Jam 2020

Controls:

  • Use WASD to control the snowman
  • Esc to Exit 

Game was created by Daniil Chebotkov

Game Engine - Unity
